oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Brother J. Alfred Moroni in His Office
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: De La Salle Christian Brothers; Interiors;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Brother Alfred J. Moroni at his desk, with two guests in his office. Brother Alfred was the department head for Business Administration from 1954-1966 and chairman of the Business Administration Division from 1966-1975. From 1969-1970, he was the Treasurer of the College; and in 1974-1975 and 1976-1977, he was the Executive Vice President for Business Affairs.
